abilities.name: Mana Break
abilities.desc: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack.  Mana Break deals 60%% of the mana burned as damage to the target.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

abilities.name: Spell Shield
abilities.desc: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Causes Spell Shield to passively block and reflect a targeted spell once every 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Mana Void
abilities.desc: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies.  The main target is also mini-stunned.

abilities.name: Berserker's Call
abilities.desc: Axe taunts nearby enemy units, forcing them to attack him, while he gains bonus armor during the duration.

abilities.name: Battle Hunger
abilities.desc: Enrages an enemy unit, causing it to be slowed and take damage over time until it kills another unit or the duration ends. Axe gains movement speed for each unit affected with Battle Hunger.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Battle hunger provides -30% damage output reduction. Applies Battle Hunger on nearby enemies after a successfull Culling Blade.

abilities.name: Counter Helix
abilities.desc: When attacked, Axe performs a helix counter attack, dealing pure damage to all nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Culling Blade
abilities.desc: Axe spots a weakness and strikes, instantly killing an enemy unit with low health, or dealing moderate damage otherwise. When an enemy hero is killed with Culling Blade, its cooldown is reset, and Axe and nearby allied units gain bonus movement speed.

abilities.name: Enfeeble
abilities.desc: Weakens an enemy unit, reducing its physical damage.  Lasts 20 seconds.

abilities.name: Brain Sap
abilities.desc: Feasts on the vital energies of an enemy unit, healing Bane and dealing damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Decreases cooldown and makes Brain Sap pierce Spell Immunity.

abilities.name: Nightmare
abilities.desc: Puts the target enemy or friendly Hero to sleep. Sleeping units are awakened when attacked, but the Nightmare passes to the attacking unit. Bane can attack nightmared targets freely.

abilities.name: Fiend's Grip
abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Grips an enemy unit, disabling it and causing heavy damage over time, while stealing mana every %fiend_grip_tick_interval% seconds based on the unit's maximum mana.

abilities.name: Bloodrage
abilities.desc: Drives a unit into a bloodthirsty rage during which a unit deals, and takes, increased damage. Units affected by Bloodrage will be healed for a percentage of the max health of any units they kill. Units affected by Bloodrage when killed will heal a percentage of their max health to their killer.

abilities.name: Blood Rite
abilities.desc: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After %delay_plus_castpoint_tooltip% seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.

abilities.name: Thirst
abilities.desc: Bloodseeker is invigorated by the wounds of his enemies, gaining bonus movement speed and attack damage whenever an enemy hero's health falls below %min_bonus_pct%%%, with the bonuses increasing as their health falls further. If an enemy hero's health falls below %invis_threshold_pct%%%, he will also gain vision and True Sight of that hero. Bonuses stack per hero.

abilities.name: Rupture
abilities.desc: Causes an enemy unit's skin to rupture. If the unit moves, it takes a percentage of the distance traveled as damage.  The damage is dealt through spell immunity.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Grants 2 charges to Rupture with a 40 seconds replenish time.

abilities.name: Crystal Nova
abilities.desc: A burst of damaging frost slows enemy movement and attack rate in the targeted area.

abilities.name: Frostbite
abilities.desc: Encases an enemy unit in ice, prohibiting movement and attack, while dealing %damage_per_second_tooltip% damage every half-second. Lasts 10 seconds on creeps level 6 or lower.

abilities.name: Arcane Aura
abilities.desc: Gives additional mana regeneration to all friendly units on the map. This bonus is increased for Crystal Maiden.

abilities.name: Freezing Field
abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Surrounds Crystal Maiden with random icy explosions that slow enemies and deal massive damage.  Lasts %duration_tooltip% seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Applies Frostbite to any unit that has been standing in the Freezing Field for over 2.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Frost Arrows
abilities.desc: Adds a freezing effect to Drow's attacks, slowing enemy movement.  Lasts %frost_arrows_hero_duration_tooltip% seconds on Heroes, and %frost_arrows_creep_duration% seconds on creeps.

abilities.name: Gust
abilities.desc: Releases a wave that silences and knocks back enemy units. Knockback distance is relative to how close they are to you.

abilities.name: Precision Aura
abilities.desc: Adds bonus damage to the physical attack of allied, ranged Hero units based on a percentage of Drow's agility.  Affects creeps for 30 seconds when cast.

abilities.name: Marksmanship
abilities.desc: Drow's experiences in battle improve her accuracy and effectiveness in combat, providing a passive bonus to Agility. Grants no bonus if there are enemy heroes within 400 range.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Causes Drow Ranger's attacks to splinter on the target, hitting nearby units with normal attacks that deal reduced damage.

abilities.name: Fissure
abilities.desc: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassable ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units along its line.

abilities.name: Enchant Totem
abilities.desc: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Enchant Totem becomes a 900 range ground target ability, causing Earthshaker to jump in the air and land at the target spot, casting Enchant Totem there.  Self-casting the ability will behave in the original form, without jumping.

abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.desc: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.

abilities.name: Echo Slam
abilities.desc: Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units.  Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units. Real heroes cause two echoes.

abilities.name: Blade Fury
abilities.desc: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units. \n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Healing Ward
abilities.desc: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at %healing_ward_movespeed_tooltip% movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts %healing_ward_duration_tooltip% seconds.

abilities.name: Blade Dance
abilities.desc: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.

abilities.name: Omnislash
abilities.desc: Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 200-225 damage per slash.  Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases number of slashes and decreases cooldown.

abilities.name: Starstorm
abilities.desc: Calls down a wave of meteors to damage nearby enemy units. The closest enemy unit to Mirana in a %starfall_secondary_radius% radius will be struck a second time for 75%% of the damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Passively triggers Starstorm every 10 seconds. Does not trigger if the enemy doesn't see Mirana.

abilities.name: Sacred Arrow
abilities.desc: Fires a long-range arrow with deadly precision, which stuns and damages the first enemy unit it strikes. The stun duration ranges from 0.01 to %arrow_max_stun% seconds, with bonus damage up to %arrow_bonus_damage% added, based on the distance the arrow travels to its target. Instantly kills the first non-ancient creep it hits.

abilities.name: Leap
abilities.desc: Mirana leaps forward into battle, empowering herself with a ferocious roar that grants bonus attack and movement speed. Speed bonus lasts %leap_bonus_duration% seconds.

abilities.name: Moonlight Shadow
abilities.desc: Turns Mirana and all allied heroes invisible. If a hero is revealed, invisibility will restore after the fade delay as long as Moonlight Shadow's duration has not expired.

abilities.name: Spirit Lance
abilities.desc: Sends a magical spirit lance to a target enemy unit that damages and slows, while summoning an illusory phantom to attack the unit.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Causes Spirit Lance to bounce on nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Doppelganger
abilities.desc: Phantom Lancer briefly vanishes from the battlefield. After %delay% second, Phantom Lancer and any of his nearby illusions reappear at a random position within the targeted location, along with two additional doppelgangers. Extends duration of all illusions. The two added doppelgangers have different properties: one takes normal damage and deals none, while the other takes 600%% damage and deals 20%% damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Phantom Rush
abilities.desc: When targetting an enemy for an attack, Phantom Lancer quickly charges into range, gaining a temporary agility boost upon reaching the target. Phantom Lancer's illusions also have this ability.

abilities.name: Juxtapose
abilities.desc: Phantom Lancer has a chance to fracture his presence, creating an illusion of himself. Illusions also have a chance to fracture further. Illusions created from Phantom Lancer last for %illusion_duration% seconds, while illusions created from other illusions last %illusion_from_illusion_duration% seconds.

abilities.name: Waning Rift
abilities.desc: Puck releases a burst of faerie dust that deals damage and silences enemy units nearby.

abilities.name: Phase Shift
abilities.desc: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.

abilities.name: Dream Coil
abilities.desc: Creates a coil of volatile magic that latches onto enemy Heroes, stunning them for %stun_duration% seconds and damaging them.  If the enemy hero stretches the coil by moving too far away, it snaps, stunning and dealing additional damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases damage from coil breaks, increases coil duration, coil break stun goes through spell immunity.

abilities.name: Meat Hook
abilities.desc: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Reduces cooldown and increases damage.

abilities.name: Rot
abilities.desc: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage and slows movement--harming not only enemy units but Pudge himself.

abilities.name: Flesh Heap
abilities.desc: Gives Pudge resistance to magic damage, as well as bonus strength that increases each time Pudge kills an enemy Hero or it dies in his vicinity.  Flesh Heap is retroactive, meaning it can gain charges before it is skilled, which then become active.

abilities.name: Dismember
abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Pudge chows down on an enemy unit, disabling it and dealing damage over time. Pudge gets healed for the same amount he damages. Lasts 3 seconds on Heroes, 6 seconds on creeps.

abilities.name: Plasma Field
abilities.desc: Releases a wave of energetic plasma that grows in power as it expands, but also zaps on contraction, dealing damage to enemy units caught in its path. Damage increases with distance from Razor.

abilities.name: Static Link
abilities.desc: Creates a charged link between Razor and an enemy Hero, stealing damage from the target and giving it to Razor.

abilities.name: Unstable Current
abilities.desc: Razor moves with increased speed, and hits a random nearby unit with a jolt of electricity every %hit_interval% seconds. The jolt deals damages, slows, and purges buffs from enemies.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Eye of the Storm
abilities.desc: A powerful lightning storm strikes out at enemy units with the lowest health, dealing damage and reducing their armor.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Causes faster strikes that can damage structures as well.  When striking buildings, it will only target towers, barracks, and the Ancient.

abilities.name: Burrowstrike
abilities.desc: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Adds Caustic Finale poison to heroes hit by your Burrowstrike and doubles its cast range. Does not apply Caustic Finale to illusions.

abilities.name: Sand Storm
abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.

abilities.name: Caustic Finale
abilities.desc: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to violently explode when its timer expires, or when the unit dies, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Deals less damage if its timer expires.

abilities.name: Epicenter
abilities.desc: CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.

abilities.name: Static Remnant
abilities.desc: Creates an explosively charged image of Storm Spirit that lasts 12 seconds and will detonate and deal damage if an enemy unit comes near it.

abilities.name: Electric Vortex
abilities.desc: A vortex that pulls an enemy unit to Storm Spirit's location, it also slows the Storm Spirit by 50%% for 3 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Electric Vortex affects all enemies within a radius around Storm Spirit.

abilities.name: Overload
abilities.desc: Casting a spell creates an electrical charge, which is released in a burst on his next attack, dealing damage and slowing nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Ball Lightning
abilities.desc: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is %ball_lightning_initial_mana_base%+%ball_lightning_initial_mana_percentage%%% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is %ball_lightning_travel_cost_base%+%ball_lightning_travel_cost_percent%%% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

abilities.name: Storm Hammer
abilities.desc: Sven unleashes his magical gauntlet that deals damage and stuns enemy units.

abilities.name: Great Cleave
abilities.desc: Sven strikes with great force, cleaving all nearby enemy units with his attack.

abilities.name: Warcry
abilities.desc: Sven's Warcry heartens his allies for battle, increasing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts %duration_tooltip% seconds.

abilities.name: God's Strength
abilities.desc: Sven channels his rogue strength, granting bonus damage for 25 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: God's Strength grants bonus damage to allies in a 900 radius.

abilities.name: Avalanche
abilities.desc: Bombards an area with rocks, stunning and damaging enemy land units.

abilities.name: Toss
abilities.desc: Grabs the nearest unit in a 275 radius around Tiny, ally or enemy, and launches it at the target unit or rune to deal damage where they land.  If the tossed unit is an enemy, it will take an extra 20%% damage. Toss does more damage with each level in Grow.

abilities.name: Grow
abilities.desc: Tiny gains craggy mass, increases his power and causes his to shrug off debuffs.

abilities.name: Magic Missile
abilities.desc: Fires a magic missile at an enemy unit, stunning and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Wave of Terror
abilities.desc: Vengeful Spirit lets loose a wicked cry, weakening the armor of enemies and giving vision of the path ahead.

abilities.name: Vengeance Aura
abilities.desc: Vengeful Spirit's presence increases the physical damage of nearby friendly units. If an allied hero is slain under the aura, an illusion of your allied hero will be created to fight for that hero.

abilities.name: Shackleshot
abilities.desc: Shackles the target to an enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.  If no unit or tree is present, the stun duration is reduced to 0.75.

abilities.name: Powershot
abilities.desc: Windranger charges her bow for up to 1 second for a single powerful shot, which deals more damage the longer it is charged. The arrow damages enemies and destroys trees along its path. For each enemy that Powershot hits, its damage is reduced by 20%%.

abilities.name: Windrun
abilities.desc: Increases movement speed and adds evasion from all physical attacks, while slowing movement of nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Focus Fire
abilities.desc: Windranger channels the wind to gain %bonus_attack_speed% additional attack speed against a single enemy unit or structure, though with a reduction to her attack damage.  Extra damage from secondary item effects is not reduced.  Lasts %focusfire_duration_tooltip% seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Reduces cooldown, decreases damage reduction, and removes penalty from Unique Attack Modifiers and item effects.

abilities.name: Arc Lightning
abilities.desc: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Lightning Bolt
abilities.desc: Calls down a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. When cast, Lightning Bolt briefly provides unobstructed vision and True Sight around the target in a 750 radius. Can be cast on the ground, affecting the closest enemy hero in %spread_aoe% range.

abilities.name: Static Field
abilities.desc: Zeus shocks all nearby enemy units whenever he casts a spell, causing damage proportional to their current health.

abilities.name: Thundergod's Wrath
abilities.desc: Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.
abilities.aghs: Grants a new ability, creating a cloud that automatically casts Lightning Bolt on nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Torrent
abilities.desc: Summons a rising torrent that, after a short delay, hurls enemy units into the sky, stunning, dealing damage and slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: Tidebringer
abilities.desc: Kunkka's legendary sword grants increased damage and cleaves a large area of effect in front of him for a single strike.

abilities.name: X Marks the Spot
abilities.desc: Targets a friendly or enemy Hero, marks their position with an X, and returns them to it after several seconds.  Kunkka can trigger the return at any time during the duration. Lasts twice as long on allied heroes.

abilities.name: Ghostship
abilities.desc: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.\n\nUpgradeable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Drags enemies with the Ghostship towards the crash site. Enemies are still able to perform actions while being dragged.

abilities.name: Dragon Slave
abilities.desc: Lina channels the breath of a dragon, sending out a wave of fire that scorches every enemy in its path.

abilities.name: Light Strike Array
abilities.desc: Summons a column of flames that damages and stuns enemies.

abilities.name: Fiery Soul
abilities.desc: Grants bonus attack and movement speed each time Lina casts a spell. Stacks with itself. Lasts %fiery_soul_stack_duration% seconds.

abilities.name: Laguna Blade
abilities.desc: Fires off a bolt of lightning at a single enemy unit, dealing massive damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Changes Laguna Blade's damage type to Pure, and allows it to slice through spell immunity.

abilities.name: Frost Blast
abilities.desc: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.

abilities.name: Ice Armor
abilities.desc: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts 40 seconds.

abilities.name: Sacrifice
abilities.desc: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich.

abilities.name: Chain Frost
abilities.desc: Releases an orb of frost that bounces between nearby enemy units up to %jumps% times, slowing and damaging each time it hits. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases damage and casting range. Removes the limit on the number of times Chain Frost can jump.

abilities.name: Earth Spike
abilities.desc: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.desc: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.

abilities.name: Mana Drain
abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Absorbs the magical energies of a target enemy unit by taking mana from it every second.

abilities.name: Finger of Death
abilities.desc: Rips at an enemy unit, trying to turn it inside-out. Deals massive damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases damage. Decreases cooldown. Finger of Death hits all units in a small area.

abilities.name: Ether Shock
abilities.desc: Creates a cone of ethereal energy that strikes multiple enemy units.

abilities.name: Hex
abilities.desc: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless creature, disabling their attacks and abilities.

abilities.name: Shackles
abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Magically binds an enemy unit so that it cannot move or attack, while dealing damage over time.

abilities.name: Mass Serpent Ward
abilities.desc: Summons 10 Serpent Wards to attack enemy units and structures. The Wards are immune to magic. It takes two hits to destroy a single Ward.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Causes Serpent Wards to have split shot, attacking two units for full damage. Increases attack range of Serpent Wards.

abilities.name: Guardian Sprint
abilities.desc: Slardar slithers ahead, moving significantly faster and passing through units, though becoming more vulnerable to damage.  At ability level 4, Slardar may move at 700 speed while in the river.

abilities.name: Slithereen Crush
abilities.desc: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy land units.  After the stun, the affected units are slowed.

abilities.name: Bash of the Deep
abilities.desc: Grants a chance that an attack will do bonus damage and stun an enemy.  The duration is doubled against creeps.

abilities.name: Corrosive Haze
abilities.desc: Reduces enemy armor to amplify physical damage and provides True Sight of the targeted unit, revealing invisibility.

abilities.name: Gush
abilities.desc: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.  Lasts 4 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Gush becomes a ground targeted wave ability that affects enemy units in a line.  Decreases cooldown.

abilities.name: Kraken Shell
abilities.desc:
Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.

Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Anchor Smash
abilities.desc: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to damage nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.desc: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Paralyzing Cask
abilities.desc: Launches a cask of paralyzing powder that ricochets between enemy units, stunning and damaging those it hits.

abilities.name: Voodoo Restoration
abilities.desc: Witch Doctor focuses his magic to heal nearby allied units.

abilities.name: Maledict
abilities.desc: Curses all enemy Heroes in a small area, causing them to take a set amount of damage each second, as well as bursts of damage every 4 seconds based on how much health they have lost since the curse began.

abilities.name: Death Ward
abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward with true strike to attack enemy heroes within 700 range. Lasts a maximum of 8 seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Death Ward attacks have True Strike and bounce between nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.desc: Throws down a smoke bomb, silencing enemies, and causing them to miss most attacks, as well as slowing movement.

abilities.name: Blink Strike
abilities.desc: Teleports behind the target unit, striking for bonus damage if it is an enemy.

abilities.name: Cloak and Dagger
abilities.desc: Riki fades into the shadows, becoming invisible. Every time Riki strikes his enemy from behind, he deals bonus damage based on his Agility. When Riki attacks, he becomes visible.

abilities.name: Tricks of the Trade
abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Phases out of the world while striking every enemy from behind in a %range% AoE once per second.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases duration and allows you to target an allied hero, hiding inside them for the duration.

abilities.name: Malefice
abilities.desc: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Demonic Conversion
abilities.desc: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.

abilities.name: Midnight Pulse
abilities.desc: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units.  Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Adds the current level of Midnight Pulse to Black Hole.

abilities.name: Laser
abilities.desc: Fires an intense energy beam, dealing damage and blinding the target, causing it to miss all physical attacks. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Causes Laser to refract between all visible enemy units within range.

abilities.name: Heat-Seeking Missile
abilities.desc: Launches a pair of rockets at the nearest visible enemy heroes within 2500 range. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases Heat-Seeking Missile target count.

abilities.name: March of the Machines
abilities.desc: Enlists an army of robotic minions to destroy enemy units in an area around Tinker.

abilities.name: Rearm
abilities.desc: CHANNELED - Resets the cooldown on most of Tinker's items and abilities.

abilities.name: Shrapnel
abilities.desc: Consumes a charge to launch a ball of shrapnel that showers the target area in explosive pellets. Enemies are subject to damage and slowed movement. Reveals the targeted area. Shrapnel charges restore every %charge_restore_time% seconds.

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.desc: Sniper increases his accuracy, giving him a chance to deal extra damage and briefly stop the movements of his enemies.

abilities.name: Take Aim
abilities.desc: Extends the attack range of Sniper's rifle.

abilities.name: Assassinate
abilities.desc: Sniper locks onto a target enemy unit and, after %total_cast_time_tooltip% seconds, fires a devastating shot that deals damage at long range, and mini-stuns the target.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Turns Assassinate into a ground target AoE ability, that after the channel period launches a critical strike and procs headshot on units in the AoE. Only affects visible heroes.

abilities.name: Death Pulse
abilities.desc: Necrophos releases a wave of death around him, dealing damage to enemy units and healing allied units. Passively provides regen for %regen_duration% seconds for each unit Necrophos kills.

abilities.name: Ghost Shroud
abilities.desc: Necrophos slips into the realm that separates the living from the dead. Unable to attack or be attacked, he emits an aura that slows enemies around him. He takes additional magic damage in this form, but his restorative powers are amplified.

abilities.name: Heartstopper Aura
abilities.desc: Necrophos stills the hearts of his opponents, causing nearby enemy units to lose a percentage of their max health over time.

abilities.name: Reaper's Scythe
abilities.desc: Stuns the target enemy hero, then deals damage based on how much life it is missing. Heroes killed by Reaper's Scythe will have %respawn_constant% seconds added to their respawn timer. Any kill under this effect is credited to Necrophos.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Reduces cooldown.

abilities.name: Fatal Bonds
abilities.desc: Binds several enemy units together, causing %damage_share_percentage%%% of the damage dealt to one of them to be felt by the others.

abilities.name: Shadow Word
abilities.desc: Warlock whispers an incantation, healing a friendly unit or damaging an enemy unit over time.

abilities.name: Upheaval
abilities.desc: CHANNELED - A powerful slowing current that grows stronger as it's channelled. Lasts up to 16 seconds.  Enemies are slowed for 3 seconds after leaving the area or the spell ends.

abilities.name: Chaotic Offering
abilities.desc: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Calls 2 Golems with reduced stats and bounty.

abilities.name: Shadow Strike
abilities.desc: Hurls a poisoned dagger which deals large initial damage, and then deals damage over time. The poisoned unit has its movement speed slowed for 15 seconds.  An instance of damage is dealt every 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Queen of Pain to move in and out of combat.

abilities.name: Scream Of Pain
abilities.desc: The Queen of Pain lets loose a piercing scream around her, damaging nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Sonic Wave
abilities.desc: Creates a gigantic wave of sound in front of Queen of Pain, dealing heavy damage to all enemy units in its wake.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.

abilities.name: Venomous Gale
abilities.desc: Launches a ball of venom in a line, poisoning enemy units so that they take both initial damage and damage over time, as well as suffering slowed movement.  Venomous Gale deals damage every 3 seconds over its duration.

abilities.name: Poison Sting
abilities.desc: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.

abilities.name: Plague Ward
abilities.desc: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50%% of the full damage.

abilities.name: Poison Nova
abilities.desc: A spreading ring of poison that does damage over time to enemy units around Venomancer.  Poison Nova cannot deal lethal damage; targets will be left with at least 1 health.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases damage and decreases cooldown.

abilities.name: Time Walk
abilities.desc: Rushes to a target location while backtracking any damage taken the last %backtrack_duration% seconds.

abilities.name: Time Dilation
abilities.desc: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for %duration% seconds, freezing their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by %slow%%% for each cooldown frozen.

abilities.name: Time Lock
abilities.desc: Adds the chance for an attack to lock an enemy unit in time, stunning it and dealing bonus damage.

abilities.name: Chronosphere
abilities.desc: Creates a blister in spacetime, trapping all units caught in its sphere of influence and causes you to move very quickly inside it.  Only Faceless Void and any units he controls are unaffected.  Invisible units in the sphere will be revealed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Decreases cooldown.

abilities.name: Wraithfire Blast
abilities.desc: Wraith King sears an enemy unit with spectral fire, dealing damage and stunning, then dealing damage over time and slowing the target.

abilities.name: Vampiric Aura
abilities.desc: Nearby friendly units restore health based on the damage they deal when attacking enemy units.

abilities.name: Mortal Strike
abilities.desc: Wraith King passively gains a chance to deal bonus damage on an attack. Kill non-player units when it triggers and convert them into a skeleton army.

abilities.name: Reincarnation
abilities.desc: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a %slow_radius% radius will be slowed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: If a nearby allied hero is slain, they will be transformed into a wraith and have their death delayed for 7 seconds.

abilities.name: Crypt Swarm
abilities.desc: Sends a swarm of winged beasts to savage enemy units in front of Death Prophet.

abilities.name: Silence
abilities.desc: Prevents enemy units in a target area from casting spells.

abilities.name: Spirit Siphon
abilities.desc: Creates a spirit link between Death Prophet and an enemy unit, draining %damage% + %damage_pct%%% Max HP per second and slowing the enemy's movement speed by %movement_slow%%%.

abilities.name: Exorcism
abilities.desc: Unleashes evil spirits to drain the life of nearby enemy units and structures. At the end of the spell's duration, Death Prophet is healed in proportion to the damage dealt.  Lasts 35 seconds.

abilities.name: Stifling Dagger
abilities.desc: Throws a dagger slowing the enemy unit's movement speed, dealing %base_damage%+%attack_factor_tooltip%%% of Phantom Assassin's attack damage as physical damage and applying attack effects from items and abilities.

abilities.name: Phantom Strike
abilities.desc: Teleports to a unit, friendly or enemy, and grants bonus attack speed while attacking if it's an enemy unit.

abilities.name: Blur
abilities.desc: Phantom Assassin focuses inward, increasing her ability to evade enemy attacks, and allowing her to blur her body to disappear from the enemy team's minimap when far from enemy heroes.\n\nStacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

abilities.name: Coup de Grace
abilities.desc: Phantom Assassin refines her combat abilities, gaining a chance of delivering a devastating critical strike to enemy units. Stifling Dagger shares the same critical strike chance.

abilities.name: Nether Blast
abilities.desc: An exploding pulse deals damage to enemies and structures in the area.  Deals half damage to structures.

abilities.name: Decrepify
abilities.desc: A powerful banishing spell that slows a unit and renders it unable to attack or be attacked. Afflicted units take extra magic damage.

abilities.name: Nether Ward
abilities.desc: Pugna places a Nether Ward at the target location. The ward reduces the mana regeneration of nearby enemy heroes, and will fire at any enemy hero who casts a spell. Nether Ward deals damage equal to the damage multiplier times the mana spent by the enemy hero.

abilities.name: Life Drain
abilities.desc:
CHANNELED - When cast on an enemy, Pugna drains health from the target enemy unit to heal himself and granting vision over the target. If Pugna has full HP, and the enemy target is a Hero, Life Drain will restore mana instead.

When cast on an ally, Pugna will drain his own health into his ally.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases drain per second and removes cooldown.

abilities.name: Refraction
abilities.desc: Templar Assassin becomes highly elusive, avoiding damage and gaining a bonus to her damage.  The damage and avoidance effects are separate, and have a limited number of instances.

abilities.name: Meld
abilities.desc: Templar Assassin conceals herself, becoming invisible as long as she remains still.  If Meld's invisibility is broken by attacking an enemy, Lanaya will deal bonus damage to the enemy and reduce their armor for %armor_reduction_duration_tooltip% seconds.

abilities.name: Psi Blades
abilities.desc: Templar Assassin's psi blades slice through the attacked unit, splitting and damaging enemy units directly behind it, while gaining bonus attack range.

abilities.name: Poison Attack
abilities.desc: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that slows attack and movement speed while dealing damage over time based on how low the target is.

abilities.name: Nethertoxin
abilities.desc: Viper releases a Nethertoxin at the targeted area. Units in that area take damage over time, have lower resistance and their passives do not work.

abilities.name: Corrosive Skin
abilities.desc: Viper exudes an infectious toxin that damages and slows any enemy that damages it in a %max_range_tooltip% radius. The acid exudate also increases Viper's resistance to magic.

abilities.name: Viper Strike
abilities.desc: Viper slows the targeted enemy unit's movement and attack speed while also dealing poison damage over time.  The slowing effect reduces over the duration of the poison.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Decreases mana cost and cooldown, and increases cast range.

abilities.name: Lucent Beam
abilities.desc: Calls a beam of lunar energy down upon an enemy, damaging and briefly stunning them.

abilities.name: Moon Glaives
abilities.desc: Empowers Luna's glaives, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.

abilities.name: Lunar Blessing
abilities.desc: Increases the damage dealt by attacks from Luna and nearby allied heroes. Luna is also blessed with increased vision range at night.

abilities.name: Breathe Fire
abilities.desc: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.

abilities.name: Dragon Tail
abilities.desc: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.

abilities.name: Dragon Blood
abilities.desc: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.

abilities.name: Poison Touch
abilities.desc: Releases a cone of poisonous magic that strikes multiple enemy units. Deals damage over time and slows the targets. Anytime the targets get attacked, the debuff duration is refreshed.

abilities.name: Shallow Grave
abilities.desc: An ally blessed with Shallow Grave, no matter how close to death, cannot die while under its protection.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Causes Shallow Grave to be an AoE spell.

abilities.name: Shadow Wave
abilities.desc: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.

abilities.name: Weave
abilities.desc: Applies a buff that increases the armor of allied heroes while decreasing the armor of enemy heroes in the target area over time.

abilities.name: Battery Assault
abilities.desc: Discharges high-powered shrapnel at random nearby enemy units, dealing minor magical damage and ministun.

abilities.name: Power Cogs
abilities.desc: Forms a barrier of energized cogs around Clockwerk, trapping any units that are near.  Enemies outside the trap that touch a cog are knocked back, losing health and mana. Once a cog has delivered a shock, it will power down.  Cogs can be destroyed by enemy attacks, but Clockwerk can destroy them with just one.

abilities.name: Rocket Flare
abilities.desc: Fires a global range flare that explodes over a given area, damaging enemies and providing vision for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Hookshot
abilities.desc: Fires a grappling device rapidly at the target location.  If the hook hits a unit, Clockwerk launches himself into the target, stunning and dealing damage.  Any enemies Clockwerk collides with along the way are damaged and stunned.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Decreases cooldown.

abilities.name: Split Earth
abilities.desc: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.

abilities.name: Diabolic Edict
abilities.desc: Saturates the area around Leshrac with magical explosions that deal physical damage to enemy units and structures.  The fewer units available to attack, the more damage those units will take.  Deals %tower_bonus%%% more damage to towers.  Lasts %duration_tooltip% seconds.

abilities.name: Lightning Storm
abilities.desc: Summons a lightning storm that blasts the target enemy unit, then strikes any nearby enemy units. Struck enemies are slowed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: While Pulse Nova is active, Lightning Storm will hit one random unit in a radius every 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Pulse Nova
abilities.desc: Creates waves of damaging energy around Leshrac, one per second, to damage nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Sprout
abilities.desc: Sprouts a ring of trees around a unit, trapping it in place.

abilities.name: Teleportation
abilities.desc: Teleports to any point on the map.

abilities.name: Nature's Call
abilities.desc: Converts an area of trees into Treants. Treants have %treant_health_tooltip% health and deal %treant_min_dmg_tooltip%-%treant_max_dmg_tooltip% damage.

abilities.name: Wrath of Nature
abilities.desc: Damaging energy bounces around the map, striking enemies close to the cast point that are in vision. Each enemy hit beyond the first adds damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases damage. If a unit is killed by Wrath of Nature, or within 4 seconds thereafter, a Nature's Call treant will spawn. These treants' health and damage are based on the current level of Nature's Call. If a hero is killed, a Greater Treant will be created, which has 3 times as much health and damage.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.desc: Launch into a maddened rage, becoming Spell Immune, 100% resistant to magic damage, and gaining increased attack speed.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Feast
abilities.desc: Lifestealer's attacks damage enemies and heal himself for a percentage of his target's current health.

abilities.name: Open Wounds
abilities.desc: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.

abilities.name: Vacuum
abilities.desc: Dark Seer creates a vacuum over the target area that sucks in enemy units, disrupting them and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Ion Shell
abilities.desc: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield that damages enemy units in an area around it.

abilities.name: Surge
abilities.desc: Charges a target friendly unit with power, giving it a brief burst of maximum movement speed.

abilities.name: Wall of Replica
abilities.desc: Raises a wall of warping light that slows and creates replicas of any enemy hero who crosses it. Enemy replicas serve at the Dark Seer's will. Replicas last until they are destroyed, or until the wall's duration ends.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases the damage dealt by illusions.

abilities.name: Strafe
abilities.desc: Clinkz nimbly attacks with a barrage of arrows. Dramatically increases attack speed for a short time and grants Clinkz the ability to automatically dodge up to 3 projectiles.

abilities.name: Searing Arrows
abilities.desc: Imbues Clinkz's arrows with fire for extra damage.

abilities.name: Skeleton Walk
abilities.desc: Clinkz moves invisibly through units until the moment he attacks or uses an ability.

abilities.name: Death Pact
abilities.desc: Clinkz consumes the target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percent of its hitpoints as max health and damage.

abilities.name: Purification
abilities.desc: Instantly heals a friendly unit and damages all nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Repel
abilities.desc: Creates a divine barrier around an ally which grants them Spell Immunity and 100%% resistance to Magic Damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Degen Aura
abilities.desc: Greatly degenerates the movement and attack capabilities of enemy units that stray too near.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.desc: Omniknight summons a Guardian Angel that grants immunity from physical damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter
abilities.aghs: Increases duration, radius becomes global and affects buildings.

abilities.name: Untouchable
abilities.desc: Enchantress beguiles her enemies, slowing their attacks when she is attacked.

abilities.name: Enchant
abilities.desc: Enchantress charms an enemy. If the enemy is a hero, they are slowed. If the enemy is a creep, she brings it under her control. If cast on a creep already under her control, she refreshes its enchant duration.

abilities.name: Nature's Attendants
abilities.desc: A cloud of wisps heals Enchantress and any friendly units nearby. Lasts 11 seconds.

abilities.name: Impetus
abilities.desc: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases attack range, and cast range of Impetus.

abilities.name: Inner Vitality
abilities.desc: Unlocks the regenerative power of a friendly unit, with healing based upon its primary attribute. If the target is below 35%%, it will heal faster.  Lasts 16 seconds.

abilities.name: Burning Spear
abilities.desc: Huskar sets his spears aflame, dealing damage over time with his regular attack.  Multiple attacks will stack additional damage.  Each attack drains some of Huskar's health.  Lasts 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Berserker's Blood
abilities.desc: Huskar's injuries feed his power, giving increased attack speed and magic damage resistance based on missing health.

abilities.name: Life Break
abilities.desc: Huskar draws upon his health to break an enemy's life, leaping at a target within attack range to shatter a percentage of that hero's current health, and slowing them.  While leaping, Huskar is Spell Immune.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases damage dealt, reduces cooldown.

abilities.name: Void
abilities.desc: Creates a damaging void that slows an enemy unit and deals damage.  Void also mini-stuns, interrupting channeling abilities. The slowing effect lasts longer at night.

abilities.name: Crippling Fear
abilities.desc: Night Stalker horrifies the target enemy Hero, causing it to miss attacks and become silenced.  The effect lasts longer at night.

abilities.name: Hunter in the Night
abilities.desc: Night Stalker is in his element at night, attacking and moving with great swiftness. Can be activated during night to grant Night Stalker flying movement for %duration% seconds.

abilities.name: Darkness
abilities.desc: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. While Darkness is in effect, enemy heroes, units, wards and buildings have their vision range reduced to %fixed_vision%. \n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Spawn Spiderlings
abilities.desc: Broodmother injects her young into an enemy unit, dealing damage. The spiderlings will hatch if the target is killed while under this influence.

abilities.name: Spin Web
abilities.desc: Spins a large web that grants Broodmother a passive movement speed increase, gives free movement, and boosts regeneration while in its vicinity. Spin Web charges restore every %charge_restore_time% seconds. Spin Web can be cast from anywhere as long as the new web touches an existing web. Webs never expire, and can be manually destroyed. When the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears.

abilities.name: Incapacitating Bite
abilities.desc: Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.

abilities.name: Insatiable Hunger
abilities.desc: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.

abilities.name: Shuriken Toss
abilities.desc: Hurls a deadly shuriken at an enemy unit, dealing damage and mini-stunning the target.  The shuriken will bounce between any Tracked units who are within a %bounce_aoe% radius of each other.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Allows Shuriken Toss to bounce twice on each hero.

abilities.name: Jinada
abilities.desc: Bounty Hunter plans his next hit, passively adding a critical strike and maim to his next attack.

abilities.name: Shadow Walk
abilities.desc: Bounty Hunter becomes invisible and gains the ability to move through other units until he attacks or uses an ability.  If he breaks the invisibility with an attack, that attack will deal bonus damage.

abilities.name: Track
abilities.desc: Tracks an enemy hero, granting True Sight of the target, and information on how much gold it is carrying. Allies near the hunted are granted bonus movement speed. If the target dies, Bounty Hunter and nearby heroes collect a bonus bounty of gold.

abilities.name: The Swarm
abilities.desc: Weaver launches a swarm of 12 young Weavers that latch on any enemy unit in their path, attacking and reducing armor until it is killed.

abilities.name: Shukuchi
abilities.desc: Weaver shifts out of visibility, gaining the ability to move at maximum speed through physical units--doing harm to any enemies it passes through.

abilities.name: Geminate Attack
abilities.desc: Allows Weaver to dispatch two attacks at once.

abilities.name: Time Lapse
abilities.desc:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
abilities.aghs: Reduces cooldown, and allows Weaver to cast Time Lapse on an ally.

abilities.name: Dual Breath
abilities.desc: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.

abilities.name: Ice Path
abilities.desc: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.

abilities.name: Liquid Fire
abilities.desc: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks.

abilities.name: Macropyre
abilities.desc: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases flame length, duration, and damage.

abilities.name: Sticky Napalm
abilities.desc: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies in the area.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to 10 stacks.  The extra damage is halved against creeps.

abilities.name: Flamebreak
abilities.desc: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Firefly
abilities.desc: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. While flying, Batrider gains unobstructed movement and vision.

abilities.name: Flaming Lasso
abilities.desc: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake.  Victims cannot be dragged over impassable terrain. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within 400 range. The secondary target is tethered to the first. Also causes Flaming Lasso to deal 100 damage per second.

abilities.name: Penitence
abilities.desc: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.

abilities.name: Test of Faith
abilities.desc: Deals random damage to test an enemy unit's faith. Heals a random amount to allied units. Always applies the maximum effect when cast on yourself.

abilities.name: Holy Persuasion
abilities.desc:
Chen takes control of an enemy or neutral creep. If the persuaded creep's base health is naturally below the health minimum, its base health will be raised to the health minimum.

Can be cast on allies to teleport them back to base. If cast on Chen, all units controlled by Chen through Holy Persuasion will be teleported to him.  

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter, allowing Chen to persuade Ancient Creeps. The number of Ancient Creeps that can be persuaded is based on the level of Hand of God.
abilities.aghs: Holy Persuasion can target Ancient Creeps, maximum one per level of Hand of God.

abilities.name: Hand of God
abilities.desc: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Spectral Dagger
abilities.desc: Spectre flings a dagger to draw a Shadow Path, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed of any enemies along the trail. Units hit by the dagger also trail a Shadow Path. While treading the path, Spectre phases through otherwise impassable terrain.

abilities.name: Desolate
abilities.desc: Deals bonus damage whenever Spectre attacks an enemy who is alone. Reduces the enemy vision for %blind_duration% seconds.

abilities.name: Dispersion
abilities.desc: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.desc: Creates a spectral nemesis to attack each enemy hero after a short delay. At any moment during the duration, Spectre can use Reality to exchange places of a given haunt.\n\nHaunt illusions are uncontrollable, take extra damage, and deal less damage than Spectre herself.  They move at 400 base movement speed and ignore terrain.

abilities.name: Scorched Earth
abilities.desc: Carpets the nearby earth in flames which damage enemies and heal Doom, while also granting him increased movement speed.

abilities.name: Infernal Blade
abilities.desc: Doom swings his burning sword, igniting the enemy. Stuns for %ministun_duration% seconds and applies a %burn_duration% second burn that deals %burn_damage% + %burn_damage_pct%%% of the target's Max HP as damage per second.

abilities.name: Doom
abilities.desc:
Inflicts a curse that prevents an enemy Hero from casting spells or using items, while taking damage over time.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.aghs: Increases Doom's duration, and will suspend its duration while the affected unit is within 900 range. Also causes it to remove positive buffs from the target when cast, and break most passive abilities while active.

abilities.name: Cold Feet
abilities.desc: Places a frozen hex on an enemy unit that deals damage over time, but can be dispelled by moving away from the initial cast point.  If the enemy unit doesn't move outside of the given range, it will be stunned and frozen in place after 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Ice Vortex
abilities.desc: Creates a vortex of icy energy that slows movement speed and increases magic damage done in its range. Lasts 16 seconds.

abilities.name: Chilling Touch
abilities.desc: A frigid gust enchants allied heroes, granting them bonus magical damage for a given number of physical attacks. Each attack slows the enemy movement speed.  Ancient Apparition always receives the buff. Lasts 30 seconds.

abilities.name: Ice Blast
abilities.desc: Launches a tracer toward any location on the battlefield, which must be triggered again to mark the area to be blasted by a damaging explosion of hail. The further the tracer travels, the larger the explosion will be. Enemies caught in the explosion, or who touch the icy ball of hail as it travels, are Frostbitten, taking damage and prevented from regenerating or healing. If a Frostbitten unit's health drops below a certain percentage, they will instantly shatter.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases frostbite duration.

abilities.name: Earthshock
abilities.desc: Ursa slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Overpower
abilities.desc: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.

abilities.name: Fury Swipes
abilities.desc: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage.  If the same target is not attacked after 15 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.

abilities.name: Enrage
abilities.desc: Ursa goes into a frenzy, multiplying his Fury Swipes damage and causing him to take %damage_reduction%%% less damage. Removes any existing debuffs.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.

abilities.name: Charge of Darkness
abilities.desc: Spirit Breaker fixes his sight on an enemy unit and starts charging through all objects.  All enemy units passed through and the targeted unit will be hit by a Greater Bash.  If the targeted unit dies, Spirit Breaker will change his target to the nearest enemy unit to that location.

abilities.name: Empowering Haste
abilities.desc: Causes Spirit Breaker to gain power with higher movement speed. His presence increases the movement speed of nearby allied units. Can be cast to improve the movement speed bonus for %duration% seconds, however afterward the passive bonus will be halved while the ability is on cooldown.

abilities.name: Greater Bash
abilities.desc: Gives a chance to stun and knockback an enemy unit on an attack, as well as gaining bonus movement speed after a bash occurs. Deals a percentage of movement speed as damage.

abilities.name: Nether Strike
abilities.desc: Spirit Breaker slips into the nether realm, reappearing next to his hapless victim. Upon reappearing, a Greater Bash of the current level occurs and deals bonus damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Causes the Greater Bash to hit an area around the initial target, decreases cooldown, and increases cast range.

abilities.name: Rocket Barrage
abilities.desc: Launches a salvo of rockets at nearby enemy units in a radius around the Gyrocopter.  Lasts 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Homing Missile
abilities.desc: Fires a homing missile to seek the targeted enemy unit. The missile gains speed over time, dealing damage and stunning when it impacts the target.  Homing Missile deals greater damage the further it has traveled.  Enemy units can destroy the missile before it reaches its target.

abilities.name: Flak Cannon
abilities.desc: Gyrocopter's attacks hit all enemy units in an area around it for a limited number of attacks.  Only the main target of attacks will receive attack bonuses such as Critical Strike.  Lasts 15 seconds or until the attacks are used.

abilities.name: Call Down
abilities.desc: Call down an aerial missile strike on enemy units in a target area.  Two missiles arrive in succession, the first dealing major damage and minor slow for %slow_duration_first% seconds; the second dealing minor damage and major slow for %slow_duration_second% seconds.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

abilities.name: Acid Spray
abilities.desc: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

abilities.name: Unstable Concoction
abilities.desc: Alchemist brews up an unstable concoction that he can throw at an enemy hero, to stun and deal damage in an area around the explosion. The longer the concoction brews, the more damage it deals and the longer the stun. After 5 seconds, the brew reaches its maximum damage and stun time. However, after 5.5 seconds, the concoction will explode on Alchemist himself if not thrown.

abilities.name: Greevil's Greed
abilities.desc: Alchemist synthesizes additional gold from his enemies and bounty runes. With each kill, Alchemist earns base bonus gold and extra bonus gold. If Alchemist kills another unit which yields gold within the next %duration% seconds, an additional instance of Extra Bonus Gold is added to the total. Additionally, causes bounty runes to yield %bounty_multiplier_tooltip% times their normal gold.

abilities.name: Chemical Rage
abilities.desc: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.
abilities.aghs: Alchemist melts down Aghanim's Scepter to grant an allied hero all Aghanim's Scepter upgrades.

abilities.name: Arcane Curse
abilities.desc: Curses the target area, causing enemy heroes to take damage and slowing their movement speed. Anytime affected enemies cast a spell, the duration is increased.

abilities.name: Glaives of Wisdom
abilities.desc: Silencer enchants his glaives with his wisdom, dealing additional damage based on his Intelligence.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Causes Glaives to pierce Spell Immunity and deal 100% more damage against silenced units.

abilities.name: Last Word
abilities.desc: Enchants a target, causing them to be damaged and silenced if they cast a spell or if the enchantment timer expires.

abilities.name: Global Silence
abilities.desc: Silencer stops all sound, preventing enemy heroes and units on the map from casting spells.

abilities.name: Arcane Orb
abilities.desc: Adds extra pure damage to Outworld Devourer's attacks, based on his remaining mana pool. Steals %int_steal% intelligence for %int_steal_duration% seconds per hit when attacking an enemy hero. Arcane Orb also does bonus damage to summoned units and illusions.

abilities.name: Astral Imprisonment
abilities.desc: Places a target unit into an astral prison. The hidden unit is invulnerable and disabled. When the astral prison implodes, it deals %damage% damage to enemies in a %radius% radius around the target.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Grants charges to Astral Imprisonment. Damage areas stack.

abilities.name: Essence Aura
abilities.desc: Whenever nearby allied Heroes or Outworld Devourer itself casts a spell, it gains a chance to restore a percentage of its mana pool.  Outworld Devourer also passively gains a bonus to its base mana pool.  Several skills with no cooldown and toggled spells cannot trigger Essence Aura.

abilities.name: Sanity's Eclipse
abilities.desc: Unleashes a psychic blast that removes %mana_drain%%% of the mana from affected heroes, while also damaging them based on the difference between the affected hero's Intelligence and Outworld Devourer's. If an enemy hero has the same or higher Intelligence than Outworld Devourer, Sanity's Eclipse will not cause damage. Sanity's Eclipse can hit units trapped by Astral Imprisonment.

abilities.name: Summon Wolves
abilities.desc: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 3-4 wolves have Cripple, and level 4 wolves have permanent invisibility.

abilities.name: Howl
abilities.desc: Grants bonus damage and bonus health to Lycan, all allied heroes and all units under their control. Howl has double effect during night.

abilities.name: Feral Impulse
abilities.desc: Increases the HP regeneration and damage of Lycan and all units under his control.

abilities.name: Shapeshift
abilities.desc: Lycan assumes his lupine form, granting him and his units critical strikes and added vision at night. During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at increased speed, cannot be slowed and have a %crit_chance%%% chance to deal a critical strike doing %crit_multiplier%%% damage.

abilities.name: Thunder Clap
abilities.desc: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.

abilities.name: Drunken Haze
abilities.desc: Drenches a target in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.

abilities.name: Drunken Brawler
abilities.desc: Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage. Drunken Brawler will always trigger if you have not attacked, or have not been attacked, in the last several seconds.\n\nStacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.

abilities.name: Primal Split
abilities.desc: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Earth gains Thunder Clap, Storm gains Drunken Haze and Fire gains Drunken Brawler.

abilities.name: Disruption
abilities.desc: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.

abilities.name: Soul Catcher
abilities.desc: Captures the soul of a random enemy in an area, amplifies all damage they take. Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Soul Catcher. If the unit dies under the effect of Soul Catcher, an illusions of that unit is created under your control until the enemy respawns.

abilities.name: Demonic Purge
abilities.desc:
Purges the target enemy unit, removing positive buffs, and slowing the target for the duration.  The unit slowly regains its speed until the end of the duration, upon which damage is dealt.  Units under the effect of Disruption can still be affected by Demonic Purge.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.aghs: Cooldown is removed, replaced with 3 charges that replenish every 40 seconds. Also causes Demonic Purge to break its target's passive abilities while active.

abilities.name: Chaos Bolt
abilities.desc: Throws a mysterious bolt of energy at the target unit. It stuns for a random duration and deals random damage.

abilities.name: Reality Rift
abilities.desc: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Reduces the target's armor for %armor_duration% seconds.

abilities.name: Chaos Strike
abilities.desc: Each of Chaos Knight's attacks has a chance to deal bonus damage, also causing the critical strike to lifesteal for %lifesteal%%% of the damage.

abilities.name: Phantasm
abilities.desc:
Summons several phantasmal copies of the Chaos Knight from alternate dimensions. There is a 50%% chance an extra phantasm will be summoned. The phantasms deal %outgoing_damage_tooltip%%% damage, but take %incoming_damage_tooltip%%% damage.

Upgradeable by Aghanim's Scepter.
DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
abilities.aghs: Reduces cooldown by 20 seconds and allows Phantasm to be cast on an allied hero. 1200 Cast Range

abilities.name: Nature's Guise
abilities.desc: Turns Treant invisible when he is within %radius% radius of a tree for %fade_time% seconds. Increases movement speed by %bonus_move_speed% while invisible, and causes a %bash_duration% seconds disarming root when attacking out of invisibility.

abilities.name: Leech Seed
abilities.desc: Treant plants a life-sapping seed in an enemy unit, draining its health, while simultaneously slowing it. The seed heals friendly units around it.  Pulses 6 times.

abilities.name: Living Armor
abilities.desc: Infuses the target hero or structure with a protective coating which grants bonus regeneration. Also blocks some damage from all sources. Dispels when a number of damage instances are taken.

abilities.name: Overgrowth
abilities.desc: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.
abilities.aghs: When Overgrowth is cast, it is also cast around Eye of the Forest to deal 175 damage per second.

abilities.name: Fireblast
abilities.desc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.

abilities.name: Ignite
abilities.desc: Drenches a target in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.

abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.desc: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Can be cast on towers.

abilities.name: Decay
abilities.desc: Undying steals strength from all enemy heroes in an area, dealing base damage as he claims the enemy's strength for himself.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases strength steal.

abilities.name: Soul Rip
abilities.desc: Undying rips health away from all nearby units and uses it to heal an ally, or damage an enemy. Soul Rip can also be used to heal Tombstone.

abilities.name: Tombstone
abilities.desc: Summons a tombstone at the target point.  Zombies will frequently spawn next to every enemy unit in the area around the Tombstone, and attack them.  Zombies have the Deathlust ability, which causes their attacks to slow the target, and if the target reaches below a certain amount of health, increases the attack and movement speed of the zombie.

abilities.name: Flesh Golem
abilities.desc: Undying transforms into a horrifying flesh golem that possesses a Plague Aura.  This aura slows all enemy units within %radius% range and amplifies the damage they take; the closer to Undying, the more damage and slow.  When a plagued unit dies, Undying is healed equal to a percentage of his own maximum health.

abilities.name: Thunder Strike
abilities.desc: Repeatedly strikes the targeted unit with lightning.  Each strike damages nearby enemy units in a small radius.  Provides vision of its target.

abilities.name: Glimpse
abilities.desc: Teleports the target hero back to where it was 4 seconds ago.  Instantly kills illusions.

abilities.name: Kinetic Field
abilities.desc: After a short formation time, creates a circular barrier of kinetic energy that enemies can't pass.

abilities.name: Static Storm
abilities.desc: Creates a damaging static storm that also silences all enemy units in the area for the duration.  The damage starts off weak, but increases in power over the duration.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Mutes items and increases duration.

abilities.name: Impale
abilities.desc: Rock spikes burst from the earth along a straight path. Enemy units are hurled into the air, then are stunned and take damage when they fall.

abilities.name: Mana Burn
abilities.desc: Destroys the target hero's mana equal to a multiplier of its Intelligence, and deals damage equal to the mana burned.

abilities.name: Spiked Carapace
abilities.desc: When activated while above ground, Spiked Carapace reflects and negates damage dealt to Nyx Assassin (max once from each source), as well as stunning the source of the damage. Activating Spiked Carapace will not break Vendetta invisibility.\n\nWhile Burrowed, Spiked Carapace instantly stuns nearby enemies when cast.

abilities.name: Vendetta
abilities.desc: Allows Nyx Assassin to become invisible and gain a speed bonus.  If Nyx Assassin attacks to break the invisibility, massive bonus damage is dealt with the attack.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.desc: Creates three images of Naga Siren under her control.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

abilities.name: Ensnare
abilities.desc: Interrupts the target and traps them in place, preventing movement or blinking.

abilities.name: Rip Tide
abilities.desc: The Naga Siren and her images hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Song of the Siren
abilities.desc: All enemies in range of the Naga Siren are put into a magical stasis where they cannot act or be attacked. Using Song of the Siren again will end the duration early.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Song of the Siren regenerates all nearby allies for 10% of their health per second.

abilities.name: Illuminate
abilities.desc: Channels light energy, building power the longer it's channeled.  Once released, a wave is sent forth that deals damage and gives vision in its path.  The longer it is channeled, the more damage is dealt.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Allows Illuminate to heal allies for 100%% of its damage values during daytime.

abilities.name: Chakra Magic
abilities.desc: Restores mana to the target unit, increases its mana capacity, and reduces the cooldown of the next spell they cast.

abilities.name: Blinding Light
abilities.desc: A blinding light flashes over the targeted area, knocking back and blinding the units in the area, causing them to miss attacks.

abilities.name: Grave Chill
abilities.desc: Visage drains the movement and attack speed of the targeted unit, gaining it for itself.

abilities.name: Soul Assumption
abilities.desc: Visage gathers charges of soul essence each time nearby heroes take more than %damage_limit% damage. When the essence is released, it deals base damage as well as damage for each gathered soul charge.

abilities.name: Gravekeeper's Cloak
abilities.desc: Visage generates a layered barrier that protects him from damage.  If he receives damage from a player, one layer is removed, and takes time to recover.

abilities.name: Summon Familiars
abilities.desc: Conjures two blind Familiars to fight for Visage.  Familiars possess the Stone Form ability, that allows them to turn into stone, stunning enemies upon landing.  While in Stone Form, Familiars are invulnerable, and rapidly regenerate their health.  Familiars grant high bounty when killed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Summons 3 familiars.

abilities.name: Dark Pact
abilities.desc: After a short delay, Slark sacrifices some of his life blood, purging most negative debuffs and dealing damage to enemy units around him and to himself.  Slark only takes 50%% of the damage.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

abilities.name: Pounce
abilities.desc: Slark leaps forward, grabbing the first hero he connects with.  That unit takes damage and is leashed to Slark, and can only move a limited distance away from Slark's landing position.

abilities.name: Essence Shift
abilities.desc: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.

abilities.name: Shadow Dance
abilities.desc: When used, Slark hides himself in a cloud of shadows, becoming immune to detection. Attacking, casting spells, and using items will not reveal Slark.  Passively, when not visible to the enemy team, Slark gains bonus movement speed and health regeneration.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Reduces cooldown and causes Shadow Dance active to be an area of effect ability, hiding nearby allied heroes underneath it.

abilities.name: Split Shot
abilities.desc: Medusa magically splits her shot into several arrows. These arrows deal a lower percent of her normal damage.\n\nThe extra targets will not receive other attack effects (such as critical strike) and Unique Attack Modifiers.

abilities.name: Mystic Snake
abilities.desc: A mystic snake made of energy jumps from target to target dealing damage and stealing mana. After it reaches its last target, it returns to Medusa to replenish her with mana. The snake deals more damage per jump and steals %snake_mana_steal%%% of the targets' total mana. Deals Pure damage to units petrified by Stone Gaze.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Causes Mystic Snake to turn enemies into stone for %stone_form_scepter_base% second, increases by  %stone_form_scepter_increment% seconds per bounce.

abilities.name: Mana Shield
abilities.desc: Creates a shield that absorbs %absorption_tooltip%%% of the incoming damage in exchange for Medusa's mana.

abilities.name: Stone Gaze
abilities.desc: Any enemy units looking at Medusa will have their movement and attack speed slowed.  If 2 seconds of total time is accumulated looking at Medusa while Stone Gaze is active, that unit will turn to stone.  Petrified units are stunned, have 100%% magic damage resistance, and take bonus physical damage.  If the petrified unit is an illusion, it is immediately killed.

abilities.name: Fervor
abilities.desc: With each continuous blow on the same target, Troll gains increased attack speed.  If Troll changes targets, the stacks drop to zero.

abilities.name: Battle Trance
abilities.desc: Troll's presence on the battlefield increases the attack speed of himself and all allied heroes.

abilities.name: Hoof Stomp
abilities.desc: Slams the ground, stunning and damaging nearby enemy units.

abilities.name: Double Edge
abilities.desc: Centaur strikes a mighty blow at melee range, damaging both himself and a small area around the target.  Centaur cannot die from Double Edge.

abilities.name: Return
abilities.desc: Centaur counters all attacks, dealing damage back to the attacker based on a percentage of Centaur's strength.

abilities.name: Stampede
abilities.desc: Centaur leads all allies into a vicious charge causing them to move through units at max speed and stop any enemy units they trample. Trampled enemies take damage based on Centaur Warrunner's strength. Each enemy can be trampled once.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Heroes affected by Stampede take reduced damage, and are able to run through obstructions, including trees and up cliffs.

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.desc: Magnus sends out a wave of force, damaging enemy units in a line.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
abilities.aghs: Increases travel distance and speed, and causes Shockwave to come back. Return wave slows units, but deals half damage to creeps.

abilities.name: Empower
abilities.desc: Gives an allied unit bonus damage and cleave on attack.

abilities.name: Skewer
abilities.desc: Magnus rushes forward, goring enemy units on his massive tusk.  Heroes hit on the way will be dragged to the destination, then damaged and slowed.

abilities.name: Reverse Polarity
abilities.desc: Magnus changes properties of matter, sucking all nearby enemies in front of him and stunning them with a powerful slam and dealing damage.

abilities.name: Whirling Death
